topics.body:
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/554667706368722bd3282100#post_554667706368722bd3282100
[spoiler]Basically what happens in the universe is that scientist are trying to discover dimensional travel! They want to know if such alt dimensions exist.

Well years go by and they finally fined and interesting formula, more years go by and they finally make a rift machine right?

Well literally the first test is to turn it on and the machine malfunctions and fucks everything up! 

And all of a sudden Cartoon Character's, Game Characters, Comic characters, ECT, come out of no where and portals start popping out all over the world.

And later this goes down in history as the great Dimension opening as scientist have found a Dimension that these fictional characters and there fictional worlds exist!

Which is bad/cool because you get to meet people like Mario and his universe!

BAD BECAUSE THIS MEANS WEIRD SHIT LIKE DEAD SPACE EXIST![/spoiler]
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5
